extendedInfo.description: There are many animals in the antique room.Let's look for the hiding animals!by uistore.netâThe dog, the hedgehog, the flying squirrel, the cat, the alpaca, the flamingo, and the zebra react to the tap.âYou can purchase the animal and custom of the room from setting screen!Let's customize it more lovely!(If you purchase any one of custom, the animal or the widget, the banner becomes undisplayed.)âYou can select the color of the wallpaper, the curtain, the chair, and the carpet of the room from three kinds. (*customized package)âThe galah, the penguin, the chick, the pig, the sheep, and the giraffe can be set. (* animal pack 1)âThe tiger and the shoebill, the squirrel, the cockatiel, the panda, and the deer can be set. (* animal pack 2)âAfter purchasing the widget, you can use the functions.âAnimals who are hiding in the room react to the tap!âThe leafs fly up when you tap plants!âVarious parts such as the door and chandelier react to the tapâªâIt corresponds to a horizontal screen.ãPurpose of access permissionãã» Network communicationWe use it by making of the Bluetooth connection and the indication of the Wi-Fi state.Use of the Google Play claim service.ã» System toolWe use it by management of Bluetooth, the change of the Wi-Fi state, a change of the general setting of the system.You may be sure that we do not acquired additional information at all.ãFunctionãWi-Fi ON/OFFBluetooth ON/OFFGPS ON/OFFAutomatic rotary of the screen ON/OFFBrightness adjustment of the screen Three levels (AUTO/50%/100%)Backlight lighting time Six levels(15 seconds /30 second /1 minute/ 2 minutes /10 minutes /30 minutes)Please note that is it not displayed after the purchase by some mobile terminals.Please confirm it again after rebooting the terminal.â» Setting methods are different according to your OS version and the home application.â»Setting method:home screenï¼menuï¼Wallpaperï¼Live Wallpaperâ»According to memory conditions,it may not be able to set normally. In that case, please restart your portable terminal and set it again.â»If you exit live wallpaper,it may not be able to exit normally by using task end application program such as task killer. Please exit it after setting other live wallpapers.â»When not normally working by updating it, it improves it when doing by reinstalling it after uninstalling it.â»When updating it with setting the wallpaper, the screen may turn black in the case of OS2.1.You can set it correctly by resetting after setting other live wall papers. It's a feature for OS, and it contains improved OS2.2.ãNew function addition! Live wall papers and themes are all you can use!ãLive wallpapers and themes are all you can use when registering to the monthly memberï¼Let's customize with live wallpapers and themes!â What is monthly membership?It is profitable limitlessly usable service of live wallpapers and the themes that uistore delivers for a monthly fee.ã»Contents for the monthly will be addied one after another.â»A part of contents is excluded.It is necessary to download home application "Final Launcher" for the monthly member registration.ã» Final Launcher download URLhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uistore.fieldsystem.final_launcherã»Compatible models: Android 2.3.3 overâ Monthly member registration methodï½¥You can register from "Monthly member" in Home setting after pressing the menu button of Final Launcher.ï½¥You can register from the advertisement displayed on the home screen of live wallpaper of free version for the monthly member.â»If you have uninstalled the Final launcher during the monthly member, all live wallpapers you had installed will automatically be turned to limited version.The use of full version of live wallpaper and the theme by the monthly member registration operates only by "Final Launcher".Please note that other home applications return to the limitation version.

reviews.title: Well Designed Graphics
reviews.comment: I only wish it would pan on my note 2 like it does on tablets. Please fix this. No landscape support. Missing some of the standard settings other wallpapers have for stuff like panning. Being able to use the different color combinations is really cool.
reviews.author: Brenda Rueb

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Deducted to 1 star because I have problems with the LWP, emailed several times but they didn\'t response. Such a cute and happy LWP with so many awesome details. However have to pay for upgrade feature in order to get rid of the ad banner. Worth it if you are willing to pay and like this kind of thing. The shoebill and deer in there animal pack are soo cute. Always feel that Uistore is all about money but have to give in for this one.
reviews.author: Phinpak Ashakul

reviews.title: Cute but.....
reviews.comment: I love the theme but it just take up too much space, would be nice if you can transfer this to the SD card
reviews.author: Vanessa Vanta

reviews.title: Free version great, but ugly ad on screen
reviews.comment: I know it\'s free and they feel the need to advertise, but to but the upgrade button on the top, so unceremoniously -_-  I usually try to use Widgets to cover it up. But I can\'t bring myself to uninstall it, it\'s so cute! And I love the animation s, it\'s like a treasure hunt searching for all the clickable items.
reviews.author: Michelle Amelia Das

reviews.title: Cute and Pretty
reviews.comment: After I installed GO EX launcher, the animations and widget combined with different themes are just perfect! Looks so pretty on my note, can\'t stop looking at my phone for hours and tapping note\'s screen... As silly as I can be, it makes me feel cute... More colour options to choose will be great. Thanks <3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great wallpaper. it causes a bit of delay on my phone, but stil love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Combine with theme please.
reviews.comment: Is there a way to get rid of the ad at the top of the screen. I hate it and there should be a combination that if you buy the theme for 1.98 the live wall paper is included with it without the ad. It\'s inconvenient to have to download both or at least include this in the theme package.
reviews.author: Autumn Nguyen

reviews.title: I like it but
reviews.comment: I think it would be more good if it\'s possible to move in sd card cuz it takes about 10mb in my internal storage..that\'s why I cant.fully buy it Cuz of that >_<
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads
reviews.comment: Nice live wallpaper but the ads are really annoying. I have not used it again because of the ads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Greatest wallpaper ever
reviews.comment: does all that it says, if you are looking for a lolita or antique style this is the one
reviews.author: Carolina Pinedo

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Ka.wa.ii
reviews.author: Elle Ella

reviews.title: Adorable
reviews.comment: Totally cute
reviews.author: Simone C.

reviews.title: new version problem
reviews.comment: i just d/w new update and i cant change anything T^T i always display in pink
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nth change!!
reviews.comment: Bug after updated!! I had bought this app, why the banner is appear again?!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crash and malfunction report
reviews.comment: After the update, it crashed and won\'t work anymore. It was working very well before the update. Please fix. I\'m using Desire HD. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget can\'t use
reviews.comment: Why my widget cannot be used in my Note??? Problem occurs after upgrade of android!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying banner on homescreen
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe the ad banner in bold font asking people to buy the animal packs STILL SHOWS on home screen. I think its a terrible idea. I have never seen this kind of arrangement.  considered buying the packs initially but after discovering the banner... I must say its quite disgraceful ... please put a persistent-ad warning on the download page so that people wont have to install then immediately uninstall- like a lot of us have done .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Animals look cute but I dont like this wallpaper at all
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Question
reviews.comment: Will the ad banner still show even after buying one of their upgrade pack?
reviews.author: A Google User
